name: Antimony
description: A brittle metalloid used in alloys and flame retardants.

name: Bauxite
description: An aluminum-rich ore used in lightweight alloys and construction materials.

name: Beryllium
description: A lightweight metal used in spacecraft components due to its stiffness and thermal stability.

name: Bismuth
description: A brittle metal known for its iridescent crystals and use in electronics.

name: Cadmium
description: A soft metal used in batteries and control rods for nuclear systems.

name: Cesium
description: A soft, golden alkali metal highly reactive with water and used in advanced electronics.

name: Chromium
description: A corrosion-resistant metal used for plating and in high-strength alloys.

name: Cobalt
description: A magnetic metal used in batteries, alloys, and radiation-resistant equipment.

name: Copper
description: A conductive metal essential for wiring and electronics.

name: Dysprosium
description: A rare earth element used in advanced magnets and nuclear reactors.

name: Europium
description: A highly reactive rare earth metal used in phosphors and advanced sensors.

name: Gallium
description: A metal that melts in your hand, used in semiconductors and solar panels.

name: Graphite
description: A soft form of carbon used in batteries, lubricants, and high-temperature applications.

name: Hafnium
description: A ductile metal with high neutron absorption, ideal for control rods and superalloys.

name: Holmium
description: A magnetic rare earth metal used in high-strength magnets and lasers.

name: Iridium
description: One of the densest and most corrosion-resistant metals, used in spacecraft and high-precision tech.

name: Iron
description: A strong and widely used metal essential for construction and crafting.

name: Lead
description: A heavy, toxic metal used in shielding, batteries, and structural alloys.

name: Lithium
description: A lightweight reactive metal used in energy storage and advanced batteries.

name: Magnesium
description: A light, versatile metal used in alloys, propulsion, and flare systems.

name: Manganese
description: A brittle metal often used to strengthen steel and improve durability.

name: Molybdenum
description: A strong, corrosion-resistant metal essential in high-performance alloys.

name: Neodymium
description: A rare earth element vital for crafting powerful magnets and energy devices.

name: Nickel
description: A versatile metal used in alloys, batteries, and corrosion-resistant parts.

name: Niobium
description: A soft, ductile metal used to enhance strength in alloys and superconducting materials.

name: Osmium
description: A dense and bluish-white metal, extremely hard and resistant to corrosion.

name: Platinum
description: A highly valuable metal prized for its resistance to wear and its catalytic properties.

name: Rare Earth
description: A category of scarce elements essential in high-tech applications and advanced manufacturing.

name: Rhodium
description: A rare and silvery-white metal known for its reflective surface and resistance to corrosion.

name: Ruthenium
description: A brittle metal used in electronics and alloy production, valued for its hardness.

name: Samarium
description: A lanthanide metal used in magnets and reactors, with moderate availability.

name: Scandium
description: A lightweight metal often used in aerospace components and high-performance materials.

name: Selenium
description: A non-metal used in electronics and solar cells, highly reactive with oxygen.

name: Silicon
description: A widely available and essential material in electronics, known for its semiconductor properties.

name: Tantalum
description: A dense metal resistant to corrosion, often used in electronics and capacitors.

name: Tellurium
description: A metalloid used in thermoelectrics and solar panels, known for its semiconductor properties.

name: Terbium
description: A rare earth metal used in the manufacturing of high-performance magnets and phosphors.

name: Thorium
description: A radioactive metal, primarily used as a nuclear fuel in reactors.

name: Titanium
description: A strong and lightweight metal, widely used in aerospace and military applications.

name: Tungsten
description: A very dense metal, primarily used in the manufacturing of high-temperature and heavy-duty equipment.

name: Uranium
description: A highly radioactive element used in nuclear fuel and weaponry.

name: Vanadium
description: A strong metal used to strengthen steel and in energy storage systems.

name: Yttrium
description: A rare earth element, important for superconducting materials and phosphors.

name: Zinc
description: A metal widely used in batteries and to galvanize steel to prevent rusting.

name: Zirconium
description: A metal known for its resistance to corrosion, used in nuclear reactors and high-performance equipment.
